Package terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks

Class Summary
ActuationBlocks These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "actuation" control.
BasicBlocks These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "basic" control.
BasicBlocks.Colorer Example building block that connects the input events to a TestThing target such that the target changes color as the input modifier state changes.
BasicBlocks.Rotator Example building block that connects its input events to a TransformGroup target such that the target rotates as input position changes.
BasicBlocks.Translator Example building block that connects its input events to a TransformGroup target such that the target translates as input position changes.
Blocks Contains constants and utilities of general use for the example building blocks.
FeedbackBlocks These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "feedback".
IntuitiveBlocks These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "intuitive" control.
ManipulateBlocks These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "manipulation".
SecondBlocks These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "second person manipulation".
SecondBlocks.FloorTarget Wraps a target object for sliding, rotating, and lifting it inside a room with an X-Z floor plane.
SecondBlocks.Room Constructs a room with lighting, an X-Z floor plane, and a defined size for limiting the movement of its contents.
ThirdBlocks These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "third person manipulation".
ThirdBlocks.BaseControl Constructs a base control with feedback and actuation input and output allowing it to be used as both a drag control source and as a control indicator target.
ThirdBlocks.LiftControl Constructs a third person "lift" control.
ThirdBlocks.RotateControl Constructs a third person "rotate" control.
VisualizeBlocks These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "visualization".
